title: Ticket #6237: Improve pool password error handling.
description: Add an explicit check and error message to detect SEC_PASSWORD_FILE is set to condor_annex when creating the config tarball. Add the same check to -check-setup and -setup; in the latter, create one if it isn't present and add the config blob from the first-time setup Wiki page. (And remove that blob for the version of those instructions corresponding to the release with this fix in it.)
